Text.Page:
The Scions have trained hyenas walking the halls with them. The wounds of their bites fester and heal slowly, keeping our troops at sick call rather than on duty.

Killing these hyenas will weaken the Scions and strengthen us. Make it happen...and bring me their fangs.

Nasty brutes, aren't they?

More than a few outriders will sleep better knowing you put those beasts down.
I can't just take your word for it. My superiors won't take mine. Kill those hyenas and bring me their fangs.
